description.h2: The xlink:role attribute of a link:footnote element must be defined in the XBRL Specification 2.1.
description.p: REMARK: The content of the link:definition element is irrelevant because the entire declaration is forbidden. These variations may also signal errors 6.9.4 and 6.9.5 for the schemas, but the point is that this test is still meaningful even if the schemas with offending role declarations happened to be in standard taxonomies.

variation.name: 6.5.28 Instance footnote contains a custom footnote role, NOGOOD
variation.description: Instance footnote contains a custom footnote role, NOGOOD

variation.name: 6.5.28 Instance footnote contains footnote with no role, NOGOOD
variation.description: Instance footnote contains footnote with no role, NOGOOD.
